nodes.text: A B1 battle droid was stationed on the bridge of the Separatist Subjugator-class heavy cruiser, the Malevolence, and under command of General Grievous.

In 22 BBY, this battle droid participated in the Battle of Abregado. After the arrival of Jedi General Plo Koon's fleet, this droid reported the detection of three Republic cruisers to Count Dooku, who ordered him to jam their communication.
